chapters.title: Chapter 8: A Simple Country Woman
chapters.info: Arrela Shiego, p. 185 (200)—Tall, dark-skinned woman who wears a sword in slight imitation of the Aiel. She has short hair. Unlike her companion Lacile, she makes it clear that she would as soon kiss a dog as any man. She is currently traveling with Perrrin's group. Editor's note: her name has also been misspelled “Arella.”
